thread.title: Live: Fog engulfs Delhi, 28 trains arriving late
thread.title_full: Live: Fog engulfs Delhi, 28 trains arriving late

title: Live: Fog engulfs Delhi, 28 trains arriving late
text: High danger avalanche warning issued in Jammu and Kashmir for the next 24 hours 07:49 AM (IST) — ANI (@ANI_news) January 30, 2017 07:49 AM (IST) — Doordarshan News (@DDNewsLive) January 30, 2017 07:48 AM (IST) 28 trains arriving late, 10 rescheduled and 1 cancelled due to fog and other operational reasons Delhi 10:23 AM (IST) & mdash; ANI (@ANI_news) January 28, 2017 07:59 AM (IST) & mdash; ANI (@ANI_news) January 28, 2017 11:27 AM (IST) — ANI (@ANI_news) January 25, 2017 10:50 AM (IST) Srinagar-Jammu National Highway closed following heavy snowfall at the Jawahar Tunnel, Banihal area. 10:17 AM (IST) — ANI (@ANI_news) January 25, 2017 07:42 AM (IST) 11 International flights delayed at Delhi's IGI Airport (Arrival 10,Departure 1),9 domestic flights delayed(Arrival 3,Dep6)& 1 cancelled due to fog 07:41 AM (IST) 25 trains arriving in Delhi area are running late due to foggy conditions, 9 trains are rescheduled while one train is cancelled #DelhiFog pic.twitter.com/00DHkCXisM — Doordarshan News (@DDNewsLive) January 24, 2017 08:23 AM (IST) Delhi: 30 trains delayed, 4 rescheduled and 5 cancelled due to fog 07:59 AM (IST) Cold wave continue to sweep many parts of North India with Leh in Ladakh region witnessing minus 8.3 degree Celsius. pic.twitter.com/OVigaNO1v5 — All India Radio News (@airnewsalerts) January 20, 2017 07:59 AM (IST) Srinagar: Roads being cleared after snowfall in J&K; power disruption, traffic jam problems being faced by the residents. pic.twitter.com/LjNqTG54ke — ANI (@ANI_news) January 20, 2017 07:59 AM (IST) As intense cold and snowfall continues to hit J&K, Poonch witnesses a rise in the demand for traditional fire pots known as ‘Kangris‘. pic.twitter.com/kE2yeZWWp6 — ANI (@ANI_news) January 20, 2017 07:59 AM (IST) — ANI (@ANI_news) January 20, 2017 07:57 AM (IST) 8 International and 14 domestic flights (6 arrival & 8 departure) delayed at #Delhi 's IGI Airport due to prevailing #fog conditions. pic.twitter.com/b1WMh5BIdU — ANI (@ANI_news) January 20, 2017 07:56 AM (IST) 8 International and 14 domestic flights (6 arrival & 8 departure) delayed at Delhi's IGI Airport due to dense fog. 07:56 AM (IST) 23 trains arriving late in Delhi area, 11 rescheduled and 4 cancelled due to fog. 10:07 AM (IST) Himachal Pradesh: Snow plunges Manali temperature to -6.2° C, followed by Kalpa (-5.0° C). Shimla's temperature presently is 1.3° C. 09:15 AM (IST) J&K: Transport affected at Mughal road due to heavy snowfall, locals seek a permanent solution to the problem. pic.twitter.com/bR0BYv53Qn — ANI (@ANI_news) January 19, 2017 07:32 AM (IST) #DelhiFog Four international flights delayed at Delhi's IGI Airport, 13 domestic flights delayed (3 arrival and 10 departure), one cancelled pic.twitter.com/lJoN8LuKHM — ANI (@ANI_news) January 19, 2017 07:30 AM (IST) Four international flights delayed at Delhi's IGI Airport, 13 domestic flights delayed (3 arrival and 10 departure), one cancelled 10:29 AM (IST) — ANI (@ANI_news) January 18, 2017 10:28 AM (IST) — ANI (@ANI_news) January 18, 2017 09:01 AM (IST) — ANI (@ANI_news) January 18, 2017 09:00 AM (IST) Himachal Pradesh: Cold wave condition intensifies in Shimla as temperature dips below -2°C; people light bonfire pic.twitter.com/OhrmxIWgqd — ANI (@ANI_news) January 18, 2017 07:44 AM (IST) #Delhi continues to reel under #coldwave conditions with mercury plunging to new levels. Temperature on Tuesday plunged to 2-year low. pic.twitter.com/5K3HAG61zA — All India Radio News (@airnewsalerts) January 18, 2017 07:43 AM (IST) As cold wave grips Delhi, night shelters been arranged for poor to battle the extreme weather conditions #DelhiFog pic.twitter.com/AvpkZRmXQF — ANI (@ANI_news) January 18, 2017 07:43 AM (IST) — ANI (@ANI_news) January 18, 2017 07:43 AM (IST) Delhi: People light bonfire to battle cold wave conditions as mercury dips below 8° C in the national capital. pic.twitter.com/yPzQP5ssCy — ANI (@ANI_news) January 18, 2017 07:43 AM (IST) 35 trains arriving late, 8 rescheduled and 1 cancelled due to foggy weather conditions 07:43 AM (IST) 2 International and 9 domestic flights from/to Delhi delayed due to fog/operational reasons. 07:43 AM (IST) Severe cold wave conditions continue to affect normal life in several parts of North India including National Capital Delhi pic.twitter.com/6hWBpb1xdG — Doordarshan News (@DDNewsLive) January 18, 2017 08:24 AM (IST) Severe cold continues to disrupt normal life; Heavy snowfall lashes several parts of Himachal; Fresh snowfall shuts Srinagar-Jammu Highway pic.twitter.com/PUlTsDqsS8 — Doordarshan News (@DDNewsLive) January 17, 2017 07:19 AM (IST) #DelhiFog : 27 trains arriving in Delhi area are delayed, 7 trains rescheduled while 3 are cancelled due to foggy conditions pic.twitter.com/vtUQabD0mL — Doordarshan News (@DDNewsLive) January 17, 2017 07:18 AM (IST) — All India Radio News (@airnewsalerts) January 17, 2017 06:55 AM (IST)
